archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1099
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer I want to have my subscription renewal dates set as a calendar reminder on my phone or email instead of/as well as reciveing notifications, so that I can choose the reminder type I prefer

properties.value: Is it for Comarch? It seems like it needs to be handled only in Self-care app (mobile calendar reminder also rather not 4 comarch)?

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
